ygData.subject: Re: Well, I got it to werk...
ygData.msgSnippet: Must be your computer/graphics card. I ve never heard of that happening and have never experienced it. Since Vah Shir don t seem to be affected at all, must be
ygData.messageBody:
Must be your computer/graphics card. I've never heard of that
happening and have never experienced it. Since Vah Shir don't seem to
be affected at all, must be the way your computer is processing the
new char models. Try turning them all off and see what that does, or
if they're off, turn them on and see what happens.

You cannot turn Vah Shir models off with Luclin (there's no other
model), so if that one's working and all others are not, must be
something there...

You should take some screenshots of "headless" chars so we can see...
sounds interesting!
